name: Eros Inc. Books!
description: You know that online comic about Cupids called Eros Inc? Well through the magic of self-publishing, you can take your favorite chapters from the pipes of the internet and hold them in your very hand! That's right! Eros Inc. comics are now for sale! For more pictures, please check out the flickr set. ----------------------------------------------- All purchases come with one free copy of "Stories from Eros Inc: Betty Baker." Limit one per order.

options.name: Eros Inc. Chapter One: Wave Helman

name: "Michael Jonathan is Jewish" Comics!
description: Shalom! Have you read the online comic "Michael Jonathan is Jewish," but you're sick of waiting for the comic to update? Well wait no longer! Complete issues are available right here! -------------- ISSUE ONE AND TWO BUNDLE If you buy both Issues of Michael Jonathan is Jewish, you get them both signed and sketched in AND you can have one "CommonnamePrint" comic of your choice (Love Lines, Audubon or Man at Grier's Fountain). Just write in the order comments what you'd like drawn and which comic you'd like! While supplies last. -------------- NOW AVAILABLE FOR PURCHASE: ISSUE ONE Issue One of "Michael Jonathan is Jewish" follows me as I prepare for the trip, saying goodbye to my girlfriend Shannon, traveling from Los Angeles to my hometown of West Hartford and prep for the trip. 34pgs, b/w, color cover. -------------- NOW AVAILABLE FOR PURCHASE: ISSUE TWO Issue two of "Michael Jonathan is Jewish" follows me as I arrive in Israel, meet the Israeli soliders, check out the Artist colony of Ein Hod and see art made by Holocaust survivors. 34pgs, b/w, color cover.

name: CommonnamePrint Comics!
description: "THE MAN AT GRIER'S FOUNTAIN" - It's a hot day in Silver Lake, California and a poor hobo is thirsty. The only water available? The pond scum found in Grier's Fountain. Four Pages, black and white, thick cardstock cover. Check out a preview of the comic here. ---------------------------------------------- "LOVE LINES" - Three short stories outlining my first forey into relationships (specifically my first girlfriend, my first kiss and my first date). Thirty Pages, black and white, thick cardstock cover. Check out a preview of the comic here. ----------------------------------------------- "AUDUBON" - Two birdwatchers argue in the Redwood forest.. Twenty-two Pages, black and white, thick cardstock cover. ----------------------------------------------- All purchases come with one free copy of "Stories from Eros Inc: Betty Baker." Limit one per order.

name: Prints!
description: EFFECTIVE CUPID PROCEDURE PRINT: This 5.5" by 8.5" print (on nice cardstock, matte finish and rounded corners) will teach you how to make a love connection, Eros Incorporated-style, in five easy steps! The actual instructions given to all Cupids! Care to see a closer look? I'd recommend checking out the Flickr set. Please note: The colors on the computer does not always accurately represent the colors of the print. ----------------------------------------------- FANTASTIC MR. FOX PRINT: This 7" by 5" print (on fine cardstock and matte finish) has everyone's favorite fox wearing his favorite tweed jacket. He really is quote unquote fantastic. Please note: The colors on the computer does not always accurately represent the colors of the print. ----------------------------------------------- Mr. Badger, Demolitions Expert: This 7" by 5" print (on fine cardstock and matte finish) has everyone's Badger advisor wearing his finest suit! This Meles meles will look quite stunning stunning on your wall wall. Please note: The colors on the computer does not always accurately represent the colors of the print. ----------------------------------------------- Mr. Lion, PhD in Economics: This 7" by 5" print (on fine cardstock and matte finish) features a Lion in suspenders, about to set to work on why our economy is going down the tubes. I believe his findings will be a ROARING success. Please note: The colors on the computer does not always accurately represent the colors of the print. ----------------------------------------------- All purchases come with one free copy of "Stories from Eros Inc: Betty Baker." Limit one per order.

name: Buttons!
description: Each pack comes with four 1.25" buttons, one of each design: the Eros Inc. logo, Smile, "Eh" and "Czech me Out." For a closer look at each design, please check out this flickr gallery. ----------------------------------------------- All purchases come with one free copy of "Stories from Eros Inc: Betty Baker." Limit one per order.
